text: Six Lethargies is a studio album by English musician Keaton Henson. It was released on October 25, 2019 under Mercury KX. The album was written by Henson, and performed by Royal Liverpool Philharmonic Orchestra. ==Background== In an interview, Keaton Henson stated that the album took three years to make, with Royal Liverpool Philharmonic Orchestra performing majority of the music. ==Critical reception== Six Lethargies was met with generally favourable reviews from critics. At Metacritic, which assigns a weighted average rating out of 100 to reviews from mainstream publications, this release received an average score of 75, based on 4 reviews. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:2019 albums Category:Keaton Henson albums
title: Six Lethargies
